plot: Aboard the freighter Glencairn, the lives of the crew are lived out in fear, loneliness, suspicion and cameraderie. The men smuggle drink and women aboard, fight with each other, spy on each other, comfort each other as death approaches, and rescue each other from danger.   Written by  Jim Beaver
title: Hombres intrépidos
plot_es: Aboard the freighter Glencairn, the lives of the crew are lived out in fear, loneliness, suspicion and cameraderie. The men smuggle drink and women aboard, fight with each other, spy on each other, comfort each other as death approaches, and rescue each other from danger.   Written by  Jim Beaver
plot_en: Aboard the freighter Glencairn, the lives of the crew are lived out in fear, loneliness, suspicion and cameraderie. The men smuggle drink and women aboard, fight with each other, spy on each other, comfort each other as death approaches, and rescue each other from danger.   Written by  Jim Beaver

write.role: (plays &"The Moon of the Caribees&", &"In The Zone&", &"Bound East for Cardiff&" and &"The Long Voyage Home&")
write.name: Eugene O'Neill
